function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of quanta correlation for SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting more bio-experiments with the virus","Technologies":"Bio-experimental methods","People":"Researchers, practitioners","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation leading to increased infection risk","Impact":"Higher probability of virus transmission in poorly ventilated spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air filtration","Technologies":"Advanced air-handling units, filtration technology","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"HVAC system aiding the spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Potential role in facilitating virus transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies on the role of HVAC systems, implementing improved HVAC design","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air quality monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC engineers"}]}
